question: Analyze the impact of technology adoption across different industries over the last year.

subtasks.task: Identify and collect data on emerging IT trends across various industries that have been adopted in the last year.
Gather financial metrics of companies within those industries to assess the economic impact of technology adoption.
Analyze case studies or examples of specific companies that have successfully adopted new technologies and their operational outcomes.
Compile and summarize the relevant statistics and insights from social media activities of companies to gauge market perception of their tech adoption.
Produce a report detailing trends, insights, and analytics derived from the collected data on technology adoption and its impacts.
